sentences.en: A couple of the managers took one look at the tall, well built Swede.
sentences.cn: 经理的夫妇看一看高的, 建造良好的瑞典人.

sentences.en: Didn't you go off with that Swede to Copenhagen?
sentences.cn: 你不是跟那个瑞典人去哥本哈根了 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is good to have many options, added the Swede.
sentences.cn: 这对于我的排兵布阵未尝不是件好事, 瑞典人补充说.

sentences.en: It was rumored that the white officer had been a Swede.
sentences.cn: 传说那个白人军官是个瑞典人.

sentences.en: Swede said that perhaps this time he actually wanted to laugh.
sentences.cn: 瑞典人说,或许这样说的时候他内心很想笑.

sentences.en: The average Swede was off sick 27 days last year.
sentences.cn: 去年瑞典人平均休病假27天。

sentences.en: The difficulty is how to make the Swede understand them.
sentences.cn: 困难是怎样让那瑞典人听懂他们的话.

sentences.en: The Swede does not believe the discussions he has had with his players should surprise anyone.
sentences.cn: 埃里克森并不认为他和球员的小型会议会影响到任何人.

sentences.en: The Swede keeps dogs as pets.
The Swede stood quite still, except that his lips moved slightly.
sentences.cn: 那个瑞典人除了嘴唇还在微微动着以外,站着一动也不动.
那个瑞典人站着一动也不动.

sentences.en: The Swede stood there still except that his lips moved slightly.
sentences.cn: 那位瑞典人站在那儿一动不动,除了嘴唇在微微颤抖.

sentences.en: The Swede was warned that the great man would probably ask him some questions.
sentences.cn: 他们提醒那个瑞典人,那位大人物很可能问他一些问题.

sentences.en: The Swede won the admiration of the soldiers by fighting bravely.
sentences.cn: 那瑞典人作战英勇,赢得了士兵的崇敬.

sentences.en: The world drivers' championship leader crossed the line ahead of the Swede.
sentences.cn: 在世界车手锦标赛上，领先选手比瑞典人快一步冲线。
